Improvements.Improvement: Refactor the method into smaller methods
Improvements.Description: The `processInput` method is too long and handles many different cases. It would be better to split it into multiple smaller methods, each handling one case. This would make the code easier to read, understand, and maintain.
The method uses a series of if-else conditions to determine how to process the input. This could be refactored to a switch-case structure, which would be cleaner and more efficient.

There are many repeated strings in the method, such as "lobby list", "lobby request ", etc. These could be extracted into constants to avoid repetition and make the code easier to update in the future.
